IN 1884 SHE WROTE: "THE SCIENCES WHICH TREAT OF THE HUMAN MIND ARE VERY MUCH EXALTED. THEY ARE GOOD IN THEIR PLACE: BUT THEY ARE SEIZED UPON BY SATAN AS HIS POWERFUL AGENTS TO DECEIVE AND DESTROY SOULS. HIS ARTS ARE ACCEPTED AS FROM HEAVEN, AND HE THUS RECEIVES THE WORSHIP WHICH SUITS HIM WELL"(SIGNS OF THE TIMES, NOVEMBER 6, 1884). BECAUSE THIS STATEMENT APPEARS TO MORE CORRECTLY REPRESENT THE INTENT OF THE AUTHOR, IT IS EMPLOYED IN THIS CHAPTER.
